blog.name: avengers-of-a-new-kind
blog.title: We're Avengers We Guess
blog.description: Hello! This is a blog dedicated to the Next Generation of Avengers. It is a UA (Universe Alteration) loosely based on the Marvel Cinematic Universe. On this blog you will be able to ask the Next Gen Group questions, Read snippets and files on their life. For more information on the timeline of the universe and all the families head to the Families and About pages. Thanks and we hope you enjoy!!

body:
Loki having a panic attack

- you wake up in the middle of the night and notice that you’re incredibly thirsty so you head up a few floors to the kitchen to get some iced water

- As you approach the kitchen you hear quiet noises coming from the lounge

- You instantly become more alert and listen before peaking your head around the corner

- You see Loki with his head buried in his hands and he’s shaking

- He notices you rushing over to him and looks at you for a second, scared, before burying his head again

- You sit down beside him, you notice his gasps for air and how disheveled his hair is

- God you hope you never see him like this again, you hate it when his sobs shake his body and he feels like he’s never gonna smile again

- So different to how he usually is, charming and witty and absolutely delightful, with that smirk of his that makes you want to punch it off his face but in a good way

- “Love, is it okay if I touch you?”

- He whimpers, letting you know it’s okay

- You shift closer to him and wrap you arms around it waist, his head coming to rest on your shoulder

- “Loki?”

- He doesn’t respond, just continues to gasp against your neck as the shock of the panic attack racks through him

- You fingers trace up and down his hip, tapping lightly and gently rubbing your thumb against it

- You whisper to him and breathe steadily so he can try to copy your breathing, occasionally squeezing him softly to let him know you’re there

- You wait patiently for his breathing to calm down, you know it’s hard for him to talk when he’s losing his mind

- After he’s slightly calmer, he cries silently, tears streaming down his cheeks as he tries to recover from the frightfulness of having a panic attack

- You wait for him still, you’re extraordinarily patient with him, and he loves that about you

- “Okay if we talk about it?”

- You earn a small nod from him

- “Is it because you’re afraid the other won’t like having you around?”

- He had just moved into the compound, after much persuasion from you and Thor, you knew that moving here would help him a lot in the long run

- But obviously it was a nerve racking decision, after all, it was clear that not everyone had forgiven him for New York

- “Only partly” he barely whispers

- “You wanna tell me?”

- He tells you about how he feels about moving into the compound, about how things are back in Asgard, about how he hates having these thoughts and how they break him down

- You’ve heard some of this before but you still listen

- And you let him talk and vent and cry, nodding occasionally and making small comments

- He finishes and looks up at you and gives you the smallest smile, but one that tells you he’ll be alright, and you’re the happiest person in the world to see it

- You sit there with each other for a while, not talking, just listening to each other’s breathes and heartbeat

- He’s really grateful for a friend like you, someone so patient and loving and kind, he loves you and everything about you

- He loves that he can be comfortable around you without any feelings or sexual tension involved, how you can sit in silence but also talk to each other at the top of your lungs

- Loki falls asleep quickly, exhausted from the breakdown

- You lay him down on the couch

- You go get the cup of water you came here for and sit down, picking his head up and laying in in your lap

- You watch him and play with his hair for a while before falling asleep yourself

title: Black Widow: Sexual Espionage
body:
Natasha Romanoff is very flexible. And no one in the Marvel Cinematic Lesbian Universe is safe…

An Avenger and the Wasp

This story takes place before the events of the previous chapter ‘An Avenger’s Infinite Sex’.Lurking in the shadows backstage at a special United Nations conference Natasha Romanoff waited impatiently…

Read more…

blog.name: hopelesscabbage
blog.title: @Marvel just wanna say if you kill Tony I WILL sue
blog.description: A nobody who spends their time obsessing over B99 and 1D and Shawn Mendes. Joey Tribbiani is my spirit animal. Occasionally spend my time questioning my existence and crying over MCU memes.

summary: Things I don't want in Endgame (to be updated)
body:
Things I don’t want in Endgame (to be updated)

  1. Tony Stark dying.
  2. Cap dying.
  3. Peter (both of them) dying.
  4. Katherine Langford to be Tony and Pepper’s kid. I mean it would be better to show them having a baby and see Tony’s face when he realises he’s just become a dad. We won’t get the moment if their kid is like 15 or whatever. The theory that Katherine plays a villain seems better.
  5. Captain Marvel to save everyone. No offense, but I would rather have Tony or Cap or even Scott for that matter save everyone because it’s the last Avengers film, and the originals deserve to save the day heroically and retire ( if they will ) in peace, setting an example for the new generation of MCU heroes. Captain Marvel swooping in and saving everyone won’t look very good for the original 6, and it will kinda make them look weaker than her, so that’s that.
  6. Natasha or Thor or Banner dying.
  7. Loki dying.
  8. Thanos to help the Avengers. After all the shit he’s done, he wants to help them? He should still be a villain and be given the death he deserves.
  9. Teenage Harley.

blog.description:
Das österreichische Online Magazin für Spiele, Film und Lesestoff.
Das Magazin setzt seinen Schwerpunkt in den dynamischen Blick in die Welt der Unterhaltungsmedien, um über Spiele, Comics, Bücher und Filme für unsere Leser zu berichten.

summary:
Ant-Man 
Ant-Man ist einer der kleinsten Superhelden aus dem Marvel Comics Universum und zählt aber auch zu den ältesten...
caption:
Ant-Man
Ant-Man ist einer der kleinsten Superhelden aus dem Marvel Comics Universum und zählt aber auch zu den ältesten Superhelden. Er wurde von Stan Lee, Larry Lieber und Jack Kirby erschaffen und hatte seinen ersten Auftritt in Tales to Astonish #27 vom Jänner 1962. Er war auch ein Gründungsmitglied der Avengers und im vorliegenden Film gibt es gleich zwei Ant-Man Inkarnationen zu sehen.

blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. Discord Join Link Links for mobile users: FAQ • Headcanons • Just the asks • Ko-fi

tags: but i dont have fifty years
summary:
(The ultimate crossover war continues!
In picture three we see the mages, led by Stephen Strange and Loki, followed by Donald...
body:
(The ultimate crossover war continues!

In picture three we see the mages, led by Stephen Strange and Loki, followed by Donald Duck. The elder Ron, Hermione and Harry have joined them, disillusioned by Dumbledore’s manipulations. Alastor Moody stands with them, as does Axel, Xion and Roxas for their own reasons. Still the trio, whether wizard or nobodies, will not be disconnected.

Picture four we see Hogwarts sect, led by Dumbledore himself. The younger Golden Trio, unaware of his plans, still follow him as does Hagrid, Neville, nearly headless Nick. Namine silently watches and draws what will come to pass, separated from everyone but not far from the fray.

The fifth introduces others, Antman fighting to protect, Spiderman trying to do good while Sora, Kairi and Riku have their first real talk in what feels like ages. The flying squad, led by Falcon, seem to be at odds where Draco does not think Ginny being a girl qualifies her for the battle, Ginny thinks he’s a git, Marcus is forever dumb and Harry is trying not to get involved. Meanwhile Percy talks to Arthur and things are looking bad.

Six and seven show our front line. Black Panther, Gamora, Goofy, Hulkbuster, Black Widow, Cap and Thor, all ready to lead the charge and win the fight. King Mickey stands almost at the front but egotist Tony Stark takes that spot to stare down the monster who took everything: Thanos. The Mad Titan is followed by Pete, forever looking for power and the Heartless, and Dementors as picture eight shows, stand by him ready to overrun and steal all the hearts. AntiSora is ready and itching to fight but refuses to fight for anyone but themselves.

But in the background the true evil waits. Ultron, per picture nine, is not far, watching, and picture ten shows us Voldemort too is present, though the elder Xehanort seems annoyed by the younger would-be immortal. Meanwhile Ansem and Xemnas, his younger selves, along with the Dusk Nobodies, watch and wait to see who will win and which bonds will be strong enough to survive this terrible battle.

Only time can tell)
